welcome_message_body: Welcome to Vaughan, where historic charm meets modern innovation. Explore our vibrant city known for its world-class shopping, beautiful green spaces, and diverse culinary scene. We hope you enjoy your time here!

restaurants.name: California Sandwiches
restaurants.description: California Sandwiches is a sandwich spot located in Vaughan.

restaurants.name: Farro Ristorante
restaurants.description: Farro Ristorante is a italian restaurant located in Maple.
restaurants.address: 2316 Major Mackenzie Dr. (Jackson St), Maple ON L6A 1W6

restaurants.name: Marcello's Pizzeria
restaurants.description: Marcello's Pizzeria is a pizzeria located in Vaughan.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Buttonville Municipal Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Buttonville Municipal Airport is exclusively for private and chartered flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Buttonville Municipal Airport handles all freight and cargo shipments.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The largest terminal at Lester B. Pearson International Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: The newest terminal at Lester B. Pearson International Airport, primarily serving international flights.

wifi.note: Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Toronto City Centre Airport, also known as Billy Bishop Airport, serves domestic and international flights for Porter Airlines and a few other regional airlines.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Oshawa Airport handles all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: General Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: The general aviation terminal at Oshawa Airport is used for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
